Frequently Asked Questions

Who is a Creator?

A creator is someone who has a Bold BI account, and creates, edits, shares or otherwise manages dashboards. Only creators are counted for licensing purposes.

Who is a User?

A user is someone who has a Bold Bl account, and can securely view dashboards that others have created. Users can interact with a dashboard using tools such as filter, exporter, etc. that are provided as a part of the dashboard. Users are not counted for licensing purposes.

Is there a trial period?

Every plan comes with a 15-day trial period during which your card will not be charged.

Is there a contract period?

No, you may cancel your service at any time. You can cancel online or by contacting the support team.

Can I move between plans?

Absolutely. You can move up or down as your business needs change.

Will my subscription be renewed automatically?

Yes, your subscription will be automatically renewed each month.
